actions.description: The enchanter makes three Arcane Burst attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) psychic damage.
actions.name: Arcane Burst

actions.description:
The enchanter casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At will: friends, mage hand, message

2/day each: charm person, mage armor, hold person, invisibility, suggestion, tongues
actions.name: Spellcasting
